title: Skies 1.1.2 (Steampunk Asteroids!!!)
description:
This is: Skies 1.1.2

This is absolutely straight-up Asteroids... just with a Steampunk setting. The controls are kinda wacky (being Asteroid-y and all) but it's pretty cool looking and fun once you get the hang of it. CHECK IT! 100% DRM-free. Just install and play!
--------------------------------------


Skies is a shoot-em-up game, with boats flying in the sky and a strong flavour of adventure. Spoiler: the gameplay is inspired by Asteroids. It never gets old!
... or does it? DUN-DUN-DUNNNnnn!!

Mandatory USPs and features:
-Three ships available
-Dozens of enemies
